settings.promo_text: Description of promotion with lots of details.

settings.text: Unparalleled Convenience: Spending quality time with your loved ones while planning and cooking an entire meal often seems like an impossible task. Partnering with Table & Twine makes this possible with complete meal kits and pre-prepared ingredients. You can still enjoy the satisfaction of cooking a delicious meal for your family with a fraction of the time and effort.

Thoughtfully Designed Dishes: At Table & Twine, we intentionally create meal kits that highlight both convenience and quality. Our experienced chefs select high-quality ingredients that pair together well without being overwhelming for the home chef. Their passion for delicious food shines through in the dishes you bring to the table. Together, you will create a Mother’s Day meal that everyone will enjoy.

Less Time in the Kitchen: Table & Twine meal kits take care of 90% of the planning, sourcing, and preparation, allowing you to spend more time celebrating mom. All you have to do is take care of the last 10% to bring out the flavors of the meal. Our Mother’s Day meal kit is designed with families in mind, so you can spend less time cooking and cleaning and more time with those who matter most.

settings.heading: {{ collection.metafields.custom.second_heading.value }}
settings.heading2: Why Choose a Mother’s Day Meal Kit?
settings.text2: Chefs of all levels will appreciate the saved time and effort of a Table & Twine catered meal kit. We work hard to make sure you enjoy the benefits of a thoughtfully prepared meal, including:

settings.title: How Much Time Is Required to Prepare the Food in My Mother’s Day Meal Kit?
settings.text: You should set aside one to two hours to prepare the food in your Mother’s Day meal kit. This includes all preparation, cooking, and cleaning, leaving you with the rest of the day to relax and enjoy a delicious meal.

settings.title: How Far in Advance Do I Need to Order My Mother’s Day Meal Kit?
settings.text: To ensure that you receive your meal kit on time, please order your Mother’s Day meal by May 7th.

settings.title: Can I Customize My Mother’s Day Meal Kit?
settings.text: Our Mother’s Day meal kits cannot be customized. At Table & Twine, our chefs have curated a delicious meal with something for everyone.

settings.heading: Heating Instructions
settings.text: Preparing an allergy-friendly meal by Table & Twine is simple! Just scan the QR code on your meal’s packaging for easy-to-follow heating instructions. These instructions are also available online.
